definitions.definition: A trench cut in the soil, as when plowed in order to plant a crop .
examples: Don't walk across that deep furrow in the field.

definitions.definition: Any trench, channel, or groove, as in wood or metal.
A deep wrinkle in the skin of the face, especially on the forehead .
examples: When she was tired, a deep furrow appeared on her forehead.

main_definition: A trench cut in the soil, as when plowed in order to plant a crop .
secondary_definitions: Any trench, channel, or groove, as in wood or metal.
A deep wrinkle in the skin of the face, especially on the forehead .
